SELECT c.cate_id cateId, c.cate_name cateName, c.p_id pId, c.level, c.create_time createTime, c.disabled disabled, new_tabel.cate_name pCateName, c.cate_ppath catePpath FROM category c LEFT JOIN
(SELECT cate_id,cate_name FROM category WHERE `level`=1) AS new_tabel
ON c.p_id = new_tabel.cate_id
and c.cate_name LIKE CONCAT("%",#{cateName},"%")
and c.p_id = #{pId}
